sn55.45:3.1: 45. Dutiyamahaddhanasutta
sn55.45:4.1: “Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako ‘aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo mahāyaso’ti vuccati.
sn55.45:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.45:5.7: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi … pe …
sn55.45:5.9: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako ‘aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo mahāyaso’ti vuccatī”ti.
